entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
